about_the_game:
Contains 1240 new puzzles of Divide Regions and 1260 new puzzles of Place Objects

Divide Regions:
  • Number Area (240 levels)
  • Meadows (240 levels)
  • Free Three (160 levels)
  • Territory (240 levels)
  • Mat Cover (180 levels)
  • Fillmat (180 levels)

Place Objects:
  • Triplets (120 levels)
  • Distant Vow (180 levels)
  • Moonlight (240 levels)
  • Gems and Stones (180 levels)
  • Roma (180 levels)
  • Yin Yang (180 levels)
  • Boxed (180 levels)

# The new levels are evenly distributed in each size and difficulty.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.11+
  • Processor: 2.0Ghz+
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities.
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
